thread.title: Busted Star Wars Fan Bemoans 'Stupid Mistake' at Comic Con
thread.title_full: Busted Star Wars Fan Bemoans 'Stupid Mistake' at Comic Con

title: Busted Star Wars Fan Bemoans 'Stupid Mistake' at Comic Con
text: Fans young and old show off their sci-fi, movie and fantasy pride - and custom-made costumes at the Dragon Con parade on Saturday, Sept. 5, 2015 in Atlanta.
